column4: hmm, the website is down, and the enlightenment channel seems dead, so I ask here... After I installed Enlightenment, how do I change it to my main "shell"?
in the past ive had to edit the gdm files to make it add an entry for it. The ubuntu wikis detail this I think.
theymay have fixed elightment where it now adds its entry to the sessions now. (i'd hope)
